hero.headline: FIND YOUR CLUB
hero.paragraph: Discover our world-class padel facilities across the UK. Each club offers premium courts, expert coaching, and a vibrant community.

clubs.name: NOTTINGHAM
clubs.description: Our flagship club featuring 6 premium courts, pro shop, and cafe.

clubs.name: BIRMINGHAM
clubs.description: State-of-the-art facility with 4 courts and expert coaching staff.

clubs.name: LIVERPOOL
clubs.description: Waterfront location with 5 courts and premium amenities.
